text: Creosote funnels can be used to collect creosote from charcoal pits and coke ovens. It will collect in a 9x9 plus(+) shape.
A line of them in the middle of the oven works.
If you power one it will collect from nearby funnels in the same radius and output into pipes.
Buckets can also be used to collect it.
It can be placed in world.
It can be used as furnace fuel. It smelts 24 items.
